intervention_catalogue.name: Personal wellbeing services
intervention_catalogue.short_description: Personal wellbeing services help men improve their emotional wellbeing and reduce their risk of reoffending. The service is structured around 4 key pathways that promote stability and positive change.
intervention_catalogue.long_description:
Personal wellbeing  services are structured around 4 pathways designed to support men on probation with the following needs:

• emotional wellbeing
• family and significant others
• lifestyle and associates
• social inclusion

Men under supervision can also get support from a social inclusion mentoring service before release. If these meetings are required as part of their sentence, they must attend.
intervention_catalogue.session_detail: The type, number and length of sessions can vary, depending on the location and service provider.
